Articles.Content:
1. Use only your jetpack to escape from gilly and land on eve

2. Make an orbit around kerbin at 68 km and watch it slowly decay

3. Put a geostationary satellite around all planets that can have geostationary orbits
4. Make a space station, then take a small ship and timewarp the ship into it, then come out of timewarp

5. Land on your head

6. Make a Pilot Escape System for your airplane and watch it fail
7 - Crash.

7. land and build a station on the ground

8. assemble some giant interplanetary ship on kerbin orbit and travel the space

9. mount a kerbin -> mun elevator ^^

7. Strap jeb to a SRB and press spacebar

8.rocket out of the solar system on a RT-10

9. 3 words: Anti Satellite Missile

10. Blow up landed capsules and airplanes.
11. Land on the Mun a RCS-only 3-seat lander, like the one seen in the 0.20 trailer (this could actually make for a good challenge )

12. Finish your thread's name so people know what it's about.

13. Add your name as a kerbal's name.

11. Use engines to do underwater exploration.

12. Build a house for Kerbs with furnature.

13. Make orbital platform for missiles.
14. Fly a plane on Duna
15. make a drone with missiles and start a drone strike on the ksc:cool:
19. Renumber your posts so that they are sequential by using the edit tool

17.) Whack-A-Kerbal!

18.) Plant a flag on the Kraken's corpse

19.) Go to Duna using only SRBs

20.) This
21. Visit all the planets and poke them with sticks.
22. Name every bump and feature on the Mun after all your dead kerbals, their grandmothers, and the devs.

21. Visit all the planets and poke them with sticks.

23. Throw Gilly (or any other planet) at Kerbin
24. Try to scare Jeb

25. Solar escape using only ion engines

26. Launch off of Eve using only ion engines

Which is harder?

34. recount all of these things so you actually are on the correct number. (next post should be number 35.)

(lazerman, I dont think either is possible, because, correct me if i am wrong, but starting either at kerbin sea level for solar escape, or eve sea level for eve orbit... there will eventually be an altitude where wings no longer provide enough lift for you to keep going up, and a speed which gives too much drag for you to go faster.)

Edited June 2, 2013 by Pbhead

35- Fly into the Sun

36- Stack Kerbals on top of eachother

24. Try to scare Jeb

Hahahahaha!!!! This one should be number one
37 - Create the largest, flamiest, most awesome explosion you've ever seen on the launchpad.
38 - Make smart things: resize all the textures to 512x512 and get rid the out of memory error (even B9 pack put a small footprint on memory with 512x512 textures...)
39 . SRB's. Use them for everything
